holidays.title: World Health Day
holidays.description: World Health Day is an opportunity to focus on the importance of global health.

holidays.title: Day of Remembrance of the Victims of the Rwanda Genocide
holidays.description: A day dedicated to remembering the deceased and working together to prevent future similar tragedies.

holidays.title: International Beaver Day
holidays.description: Join us as we learn more about one of the world’s cutest four-footed engineers.

holidays.title: International Day of Reflection on the Genocide in Rwanda
holidays.description: Today, let us commemorate and honor the countless victims of the Rwandan genocide.

holidays.title: International Snail Papers Day
holidays.description: Flip over a newspaper and consume that handpicked piece of news as we mark this day.

holidays.title: International Snailpapers Day
holidays.description: On International Snailpapers Day, let's take the opportunity to remember printed newspapers before they’re gone forever.

holidays.title: Karume Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate the life and times of Abeid Karume, Zanzibar’s first president.

holidays.title: Make the First Move Day
holidays.description: Stand together with anti-bullying advocates and bullying victims as they strive for one cause.

holidays.title: Metric System Day
holidays.description: Let's celebrate the special anniversary of the world’s most recognized standard of measurement!

holidays.title: Motherhood and Beauty Day
holidays.description: Let's come together to celebrate Armenian mothers on Motherhood and Beauty Day.

holidays.title: Mozambican National Women's Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate women and everything about them on Mozambican National Women’s Day!

holidays.title: National Coffee Cake Day
holidays.description: Name a more delectable duo than a steaming mug of coffee and a slice of cake.

holidays.title: National Girl Me Too Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate and appreciate women and all their achievements.

holidays.title: National Nico Day
holidays.description: To all the Nicos around the world, here’s a unique holiday just for you.

holidays.title: National No Housework Day
holidays.description: Put down the laundry, toss out the to-do list, and take a break.

holidays.title: National Pet Health Insurance Day
holidays.description: Prioritize your pet’s health and safeguard your finances on Pet Health Insurance Day.

holidays.title: National Sexual Assault Awareness Month's Day of Action
holidays.description: Today, we stand united in opposing all forms of sexual assault! Join us!

holidays.title: Public Television Day
holidays.description: Take a moment to think about the important role public television plays in our society.

holidays.title: SAAM Day of Action
holidays.description: Spread the word and show support for sexual assault survivors on this Day of Action.

holidays.title: Southland Anniversary
holidays.description: Indulge your adventurous side on Southland Anniversary with various activities in New Zealand!

holidays.title: Anne-Marie’s Birthday
holidays.description: Nothing is impossible for this songstress. Celebrate her special day right here with us!
